attr.title: Rolus in the Outskirts
attr.desc: The top-down adventure game where nothing ever seems to go your way. Soak in the atmosphere as you wander around the middle of nowhere, looking for one thing: a dollar-menu cheeseburger. WARNING: contains depictions of violence, suicide, and language.
attr.inst: Download the demo from Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3008890/Rolus_in_the_Outskirts and add the data to `rolusoutskirts/assets`.
